description.accordion: An accordion element to show and hide content.
description.alert: An alert element that is used to draw attention.
description.badge: A badge element used to highlight new or updated content, indicate status, or convey additional information.
description.banner: Call to action banner that stick to the top or bottom of the page.
description.breadcrumbs: A breadcrumb navigation element that can be used to show a user's location within a website.
description.button: A button element that can be used to trigger an action.
description.card: A card element that can be used to display content.
description.checkbox: A checkbox element that can be used to select one or more options.
description.command: A simple and searchable command menu element.
description.context-menu: A context menu element that can be used to show a menu of actions for functions.
description.copy-to-clipboard: An element that will copy text to clipboard when clicked.
description.date-picker: A date picker element that can be used to select a date.
description.image-gallery: A simple image gallery element for showing images.
description.modal: A simple modal element that can be used to show and hide content.
description.menubar: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications, offering convenient access to a consistent set of commands.
description.pagination: A pagination element that can be used to navigate through pages of content.
description.popover: A popover element that can display rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.
description.progress: A progress element that can be used to show the progress of a task.
description.quotes: A blockquote element that can be used to display a quote.
description.radio-group: A radio selection element that can be used to select one option.
description.range-slider: A range slider element that uses the input type range.
description.select: A custom select input element that can be used to select an option.
description.slide-over: A slide-over element that can be used to show content from the side.
description.switch: A simple toggle switch element to enable or disable an option.
description.tabs: A tab element that can be used to show and hide content.
description.table: A table element for displaying tabular data.
description.textarea: A textarea form input element for collecting long user info.
description.textarea-auto-resize: A textarea form input element that automatically resizes to fit the content.
description.text-input: A form input element that can be used to collect user input.
description.tooltip: A simple tooltip element that can be used to show additional information.
description.typing-effect: This is an element that can be used to type text on to the screen.
description.video: A customized video element that can be used to display a video.

container.accordion: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-start justify-start max-w-lg mx-auto
container.alert: w-full p-10 box-border flex flex-col space-y-5 items-center justify-center max-w-3xl mx-auto
container.badge: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center space-x-2
container.breadcrumbs: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center mx-auto
container.button: w-full p-10 box-border flex space-x-3 items-center justify-center mx-auto
container.card: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center mx-auto
container.checkbox: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center mx-auto
container.command: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.context-menu: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.copy-to-clipboard: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.date-picker: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.dropdown-menu: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.full-screen-menu: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.full-screen-modal: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.hover-card: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.image-gallery: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.modal: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.menubar: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.navigation-menu: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.popover: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.progress: w-full max-w-sm mx-auto p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.quotes: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.radio-group: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.select: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.slide-over: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.switch: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.tabs: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.textarea: w-full py-10 px-48 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.textarea-auto-resize: w-full py-10 px-48 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.text-animation: w-full py-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.text-input: w-full py-10 px-48 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.tooltip: w-full p-10 box-border flex items-center justify-center
container.video: py-10 w-[640px] mx-auto box-border flex items-center justify-center
